include » osgART

VideoLayer File Reference

Detailed Description

Defined an OpenSceneGraph geode for creating a VideoLayer Object. This object is combined with the VideoManager for displaying a video background using in AR Application (video see-through approach).

Remarks:
the layer value 1 has no transparency.

History :

Author:
Julian Looser Julian.Looser@hitlabnz.org

Raphael Grasset Raphael.Grasset@hitlabnz.org

Date:
01/12/07

#include "osgART/GenericVideoObject"
